Great for Daily and Casual Wear, High Softness & Wearability. ·Good elasticity, soft material and beautiful colors.High quality bright colors never fade fashion and young. ·Classic mens long sleeve polo shirts/hoodie sweatshirt,casual basic pullover tops, great to be matched with jeans, capris, skirts, leggings, sweatpants, pants. ·Perfect for leisure, travel, daily life,casual outtings, office, school, party, Workout club anywhere. ·Note: Please allow 0.5-1.0 inches measuring deviation due to manual measurement and different stretch of fabrics. ·Standard delivery:7-15 days.Expedited delivery:3-5 days. ·others:shirts for men polo t shirt hawaiian flannel mens dress shirts henley tuxedo denim button up golf compression fishing button down oxford shirt graphic tees religion casual linen cotton beach summer mens clothing online long short sleeve button up white dress western big and tall mens cowboy silk floral shirts henley styles novelty 3d printed funny graphic tee shirts crew neck cuff designer custom plus size cool 80% Cotton, 20% Polyester Note :Size runs small,Please check the size chart before purchase and choose 1-2 size up. 								[1659] row ''
									[1660] rowheader ''
									[1661] cell ''
					[1662] cell 'Product Description DIY Digital Night Vision Scope for Rifle Hunting BHNDOING DIY Night Vision Scope for riflescopes BHNDOING DIY Night Vision is a light weight rear mounted night vision add on that allows you to quickly and easily convert your day scope into a state of the art night vision rifle scope for close and long range hunting day or night. 720P HD colour Day-time and 720P HD Night-time. Please kindly note: The BHNDOING night vision scope is not scope;Rather, it is a system that you can use with your rifle scope as a night sighting system. There are separate parts that, when combined, create a complete system you can attach to your scope. Features of Night Vision Scope for riflescopes Easy to install DIY Night Vision for Rifle Scope Night Vision Scope for riflescopes BHNDOING BHNDOING Intellectually designed night vision device-indispensable for hunting BHNDOING DIY Night Vision Scope for riflescopes Make your hunting experience more beautiful and Meaningful What\'s in the package? Batteries are not included in the package due to transportation restrictions 1X 5" HD 720P Display 1X Day/Night Camera 1X IR L(a)ser flashlight 1X IR Mount 2X Ring Mount 1X Screwdriver 1X Camouflage Wrap Product Quick Look FCC product certification: BHNDOING Night Vision for Rifle Scope Statement: The materials and construction are in compliance with the FCC standard.You can view in product guides and documents certificate.'

							StaticText 'BHNDOING DIY Night Vision is a light weight rear mounted night vision add on that allows you to quickly and easily convert your day scope into a state of the art night vision rifle scope for close and long range hunting day or night.'

						[1681] paragraph ''
							StaticText 'Please kindly note:'
						[1682] paragraph ''

						[1683] paragraph ''

									[1703] columnheader "5'' protable display screen"

					[1836] cell "Product Quick Look Now you can use one spotting scope for multiple applications without the hassle of removing or swapping parts! with its 0-90-degree eyepiece range, the Orion grandview vari-angle 20-60x60mm spotter can quickly switch between straight-through viewing for target practice, Degree viewing for observing the Moon and stars, or any angle between 0 and Degree for comfortable daytime viewing of the horizon. This unique flexibility gives the grandview vari-angle spotting scope a big advantage over fixed-orientation spotters, since you get to decide which viewing angle is best for your particular observing needs. WHAT'S more, this high-end instrument also features a rotating tripod socket for even more eyepiece orientation control. With its adjustable 20-60x zoom eyepiece, this spotting scope will let you Survey wider areas at 20-power with a 1.Degree field-of-view, and take closer looks at 60-power with a 1.Degree field. Helpful markings around the eyepiece let you quickly switch between 20x, 30x, 40x, 50x and 60x magnification. This powerful spotter can focus on objects as close as 20 feet (6M) away. The grandview vari-angle spotting scope's long eye relief range of 31-18.5mm allows comfortable use while wearing eyeglasses, and a rubber pop-down eyecup and extendable sun shade helps prevent peripheral light and glare from disrupting viewing sessions. The exit pupil ranges from 3mm at 20x to 1mm at 60x. The Orion grandview vari-angle 20-60x60mm spotter features fully multi coated optics which transmit the maximum amount of light to the eyepiece for bright, high contrast views. Contrast is further optimized thanks to internal baffle rings and a flat-black interior. A thread-on objective lens cap and friction-fit eyepiece cap keep the spotting scope's lenses clean, and an included aluminum-clad hard carry case with custom dive-cut foam insert keeps the 60mm spotter safe during transport and storage. Weighs 3.6 lbs. Super-versatile spotter lets you view straight-through, at 45-deg, at 90-deg or at any angle between zero and 90 with its unique adjustable-angle eyepiece Switch between lower and higher magnification easily with the 20-60x continuous zoom eyepiece Fully multi-coated Optics Transmit maximum light for bright, clear views Includes Deluxe aluminum-clad hard carry case with dive-cut foam interior Weighs 3.6 lbs"

step_data.thought:
Looking at the current page, I can see that I'm already on the product comparison page. The page shows a comparison table with three products:

1. 'Maryia Men 3D Creative Printed Graphic T Shirts' (a clothing item)
2. 'BHNDOING DIY Night Vision Scope for riflescopes' (one of the scopes I need to compare)
3. 'Orion 40908 Grandview Vari-Angle Zoom Spottingx 40mm, Slate' (the other scope I need to compare)

Since I need to compare only the two scopes and not the T-shirt, I should remove the T-shirt from the comparison. I can see there are 'Remove Product' links at the top of each column. I'll remove the T-shirt (first column) to focus on comparing just the two scopes.

Let me click the 'Remove Product' link for the T-shirt in the first column.
